meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7563.

td.p: William Baldwin, a law student from New Haven, Connecticut
Nathan Flynn, an English teacher from Royal Oak, Michigan
Brandon Randall, a student from Provo, Utah (whose 2-day cash winnings total $42,002)

tr.td: PORTUGUESE HISTORY
BAGELS
MOOD MUSIC
5 OF 7 DEADLY SINS, IN SOME FORM
PAINTINGS
SURPRISE!
